tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE communications (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policyholder_id INT NOT NULL,
    communication_date DATE NOT NULL,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policyholder_id INT,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_content TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE policyholders (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE communications ( 
  communication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  policyholder_id UUID REFERENCES policyholders (policyholder_id), 
  communication_timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
  communication_type VARCHAR(50), 
  communication_content TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE policies ( 
  policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  policyholder_id UUID REFERENCES policyholders (policyholder_id), 
  policy_type VARCHAR(50), 
  policy_start_date DATE, 
  policy_end_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policyholder_id INT,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_date DATE,
    communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE policyholders (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    communication_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);
